title: To Riot and it's Client Development Team
body:
I have been able to play a single game of League since 5/2 under today's patch for 7.11 (?) and I wanted to thank you all. The Client looks great, functions well and is significantly more stable now. I'm not sure what was changed but everything works -- for me at least -- as intended now.

It's been a long 4 weeks of banging my head against the wall trying to find why I couldn't launch the client. I'm so glad that the issue(s) can be considered water under the bridge at this point.

xaufi

replies.body:
The road might have been a little rough, but the grass is always greener on the other side! Thanks for sticking with us! ^_^
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
